mapper.sql: CONTACT_ID, PERSON_ID, COMPANY_ID, RELATIONSHIP, FULL_NAME, BIRTH_DATE, GENDER, MARITAL_STATUS, BLOOD_TYPE, BENEFICIARY_PRIORITY_CODE, CLOTH_SIZE, EMAIL, PHONE_NUMBER, MEDICAL_INSURANCE_NUMBER, START_DATE, END_DATE, CREATED_BY, CREATION_DATE, LAST_UPDATED_BY, LAST_UPDATE_DATE
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'false' as QUERYID,
from PEA_CONTACTS
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert:
select PEA_CONTACTS_S.nextval from dual
insert into PEA_CONTACTS (CONTACT_ID, PERSON_ID, COMPANY_ID, RELATIONSHIP, FULL_NAME, BIRTH_DATE, GENDER, MARITAL_STATUS, BLOOD_TYPE, BENEFICIARY_PRIORITY_CODE, CLOTH_SIZE, EMAIL, PHONE_NUMBER, MEDICAL_INSURANCE_NUMBER, START_DATE, END_DATE, CREATED_BY, CREATION_DATE, LAST_UPDATED_BY, LAST_UPDATE_DATE) values (#{contactId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{personId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{companyId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{relationship,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fullName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{birthDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gender,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{maritalStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bloodType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{beneficiaryPriorityCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{clothSize,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phoneNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{medicalInsuranceNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createdBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{creationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastUpdatedBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{lastUpdateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
